  • Method Details

    • book

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'PARENT\')") public boolean book(Integer receptionTimeslotID)
      Description copied from interface: ReceptionAgendaService
      Books a reception timeslot for a given ID.
      Specified by:
      book in interface ReceptionAgendaService
      Parameters:
      receptionTimeslotID - the ID of the reception timeslot to be booked
      Returns:
      true if the timeslot is successfully booked, false otherwise Pre-condition: - The `receptionTimeslotID` must not be null. - The timeslot associated with the given ID must exist and be available for booking. Post-condition: - The timeslot is marked as booked. - Returns true if booking is successful, false if the timeslot is not available or does not exist.

    • confirm

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'TEACHER\')") public boolean confirm(ReceptionBookingId receptionTimeslotID)
      Description copied from interface: ReceptionAgendaService
      Confirms a previously booked reception timeslot.
      Specified by:
      confirm in interface ReceptionAgendaService
      Parameters:
      receptionTimeslotID - the ID of the reception timeslot to confirm
      Returns:
      true if the timeslot is successfully confirmed, false otherwise Pre-condition: - The `receptionTimeslotID` must not be null. - The timeslot associated with the given ID must exist and have been booked. Post-condition: - The timeslot is marked as confirmed. - Returns true if confirmation is successful, false otherwise.

    • refuse

Post-condition: - The timeslot is marked as refused. - Returns true if refusal is successful, false otherwise.

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'TEACHER\') || hasRole(\'PARENT\')") public List<ReceptionTimeslotResponse> getSlots(@NotNull @NotNull UUID teacherID)
      Description copied from interface: ReceptionAgendaService

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      teacherID - the UUID of the teacher
      Returns:

    • createReceptionTimetable

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'TEACHER\') || hasRole(\'SECRETARY\')") public ReceptionTimetable createReceptionTimetable(UUID teacherId, String textInfo)
      Description copied from interface: ReceptionAgendaService
      Creates a reception timetable for a specific teacher with the provided text information.
      Specified by:
      createReceptionTimetable in interface ReceptionAgendaService
      Parameters:
      teacherId - the UUID of the teacher for whom the timetable is being created
      textInfo - the text information about the reception timetable
      Returns:
      the created `ReceptionTimetable` object Pre-condition: - The `teacherId` and `textInfo` must not be null. - The teacher with the specified `teacherId` must exist. Post-condition: - A new reception timetable is created, associated with the specified teacher, and saved in the repository. - The timetable includes the provided text information and has a start validity date of the current day.
